ygData.subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars
ygData.msgSnippet: The Radicons had walked off and left Drazom, but now they were walking back and they seen him again. Airbomber laughed. There s the guy I saved, I wonder why

Content-Transfer-Encoding: quoted-printable

The Radicons had walked off and left Drazom, but now they were walking back=
 and they seen him again. Airbomber laughed.

"There's the guy I saved, I w=
onder why he wants to die?" Airbomber asked.

"I don't know, but I will obl=
ige his needs!" Stranato said. Stranato walked up behind Drazom slowly. Str=
anato pulled out a knife, something he had stolen from the People's Base, a=
nd plunged it down, the knife screaming toward Drazom's back.

Stronghold a=
nd Blender took a sip of their beer.

"Why does that guy want to die, thoug=
h?" Arrow asked.

"Some bots are crazy." Train Wreck said, the 5 Radicons w=
atching Stranato...
  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: ilovealllizards=
 
  To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
  Sent: Wednesday, June 28, 2000 7:01 PM
  Subj=
ect: Re: Neo Beast Wars


  *Drazom slowly turns his head and looks at The =
Radicons* Drazom:....no......I must...die for.....my stupidity...of....mess=
ing up with......Mantella..... *Drazom's optics widen as he remembers somet=
hing* Drazom:...hey....I'm a Pred.....I AM!.....kill me........*Drazom pull=
s hisself up by a tree limb and mech fluid pours out of his side and he fal=
ls back to the ground shivering from how cold it is getting from the lack o=
f mech fluid*
    ----- Original Message ----- 
    From: THECODE 
    To: =
nbwrpg@egroups.com 
    Sent: Tuesday, June 27, 2000 10:59 PM
    Subject: =
Neo Beast Wars


    Train Wreck walked away from the battle, Plintissa and=
 Stronghold run away. Stranato, not seeing any point in continuing the batt=
le, ran off with them. Scamrock followed with a grunt from being outnumbere=
d. Artist laughed and ran after them as well.

    "Know what my names gonn=
a be now? I'm going to be Blender!" Scamrock said.

    "Who cares about yo=
u?" Stranato asked. Stronghold reached out to grab Stranato but he cartwhee=
led out of the way.

    "We left that idiot Arrow in your CR Chamber, Plin=
tissa." Stronghold said.

    "WHAT!?" Stranato yelled.

    "It's my base,=
 and Arrow is welcome to be repaired there and so are the other former Radi=
cons!" Plintissa yelled.

    The Radicons nodded and walked on, Stranato g=
rumbled out something that none of them, could understand. Airbomber seen t=
hem and waved to them. The People's Base's secret passageway was in the nea=
rby swamp.

    "Get ready!" Train Wreck said to Airbomber.

    "What abou=
t this guy?" Airbomber asked.

    "Never mind him." Train Wreck said. Airb=
omber drug Drazom out of the water and ushered him to come along while he w=
alked with his comrades.

    Dracona was getting furious, and so was Gango=
n.

    "Sorry Gangon, I did all I could, maybe BrightBlade will still show=
 up anyway." Dracona said. Gangon waited while Dracona flew away.

    "Hey=
! Wait! You forgot to untie meeeee!" Gangon screamed.

    Dracona didn't h=
ear and landed next to the People's Group members. The Radicons, Plintissa,=
 Dracona, and Artist all entered the Poeple's base through the secret passa=
ge way, the computer reconizing them as friends. Train Wreck and Airbomber =
stepped into a door.

    "Hey, Stranato, look at this! It's amazing!" Trai=
n Wreck called out. Arrow steps out of the CR Chamber all healed up.

    "=
Yeah, it's got lots of beer and cigars in here, too! and it's big enough to=
 put a table in to play cards! How come we never noticed this room before?"=
 Airbomber said. Stranato walked into the room. Stronghold and Blender foll=
owed.

    "Wait up guys!" Arrow called out, running into the room. Plintis=
sa sealed the door magnetically upon order from Train Wreck, the Radicons w=
ere locked inside the room to sort out their problems. There was alot of ba=
nging, but it eventually stopped. Alot of name calling, too. Plintissa laug=
hed and sat down at a table to play cards with Dracona.

    "Oh, man! Not =
even a drop of beer in here! We'll dehydrate drinking water!" Stronghold sa=
id.

    "What are we going to do? Nothing to smoke!" Blender said.

    "I=
 have more needs than all of you idiots put together! I'm getting fat and n=
eed to exercise!" Stranato yelled.

    "How come we can't all get along! I=
 don't like it in here neither!" Arrow said. Stranato looked at him like he=
 was going to kill him. Arrow cowered in the corner.

    "You see? That's =
why you fail, Arrow, you don't stand up against Stranato and his stupid rul=
es! This was our idea!" Train Wreck yelled.

    "Yeah, and nobody is getti=
ng out of here until we are all friends again." Airbomber said.

    Strana=
to sighed in disapointment. Arrow stood up again, and started pacing the ro=
om. Stronghold and Blender started to look in cracks in the wall for someth=
ing to drink, despite plenty of water in this room. Train Wreck was discuss=
ing something with Arrow and Airbomber, and Stronghold and Blender joined t=
hem before long.

    "Say, you guys, it's really lonely sitting here with =
nothing to do, and--"

    "Shut up and get your ass over here! Of course y=
ou can join us!" Arrow said, cutting off Stranato. Stranato walks over and =
sits with them. Stronghold pulls out a pack of playing cards.

    Plintiss=
a and Dracona smile to each other and walk up and out of the secret passgew=
ay, taking a walk across a field...
